info.description:
==============
Products.Forum
==============

Products.Forum is an extension for classic discussion forum environment.
Site visitors can create topics (subjects or questions) and add comments
to existing topics.


Installation
------------

Install Products.Forum by adding it to your buildout::

    [buildout]

    ...

    eggs =
        Products.Forum


and then running ``bin/buildout``


License
-------

The project is licensed under the GPLv2.


Contributors
============

- leong, leong@gw20e.com
